text:
I'm trying to center a table cell vertically and horizontally.

The following works for PDF but not RTF output in fop-trunk:

<fo:table-cell display-align="center">
  <fo:block text-align="center">
    Test<fo:block />
  </fo:block>
</fo:table-cell>
creator: jamie@correctionssoftware.com
jamie@correctionssoftware.com
text:
Any thoughts on this guys?

This affects the letterhead that is on every document in our software... We
cannot continue this project until both the PDF and RTF versions look the same.

-Jamie

Sorry, you got ignored. Busy times. Anyway, today you got lucky and I looked
into this. Vertical alignment (display-align) was actually not implemented for
RTF output at all. But it was easy to add, and so I did:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&rev=492769

Please note that this will not make it into 0.93, so you'll have to use the
latest FOP Trunk code from SVN. In my tests text-align worked as expected.
Please retry with the latest FOP Trunk. Reopen this issue if you continue to
have problems.
